title: Product to a Power Property
text: The Power Property: $${\left(a^m\right)}^n$$ $$=$$ $$a^{m n}$$, the Product Property: $$a^m a^n=a^{m+n}$$
speech: The Power Property:  parentheses a to the m-th  to the n-th   is equal to  , a raised to the m n power , the Product Property: , a to the m-th a to the n-th is equal to, a raised to the m plus n power

, a raised to the m n power
, the Product Property:  , a to the m-th a to the n-th is equal to, a raised to the m plus n power

title: Exponents Multiplication
text: To raise a power to a power, we multiply the exponents.
speech: To raise a power to a power, we multiply the exponents.
